greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: One-based index of the toggled bit between n and A268717(n+1): a(n) = A070939(A003987(n,A268717(1+n))).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
program: (Scheme) (define (A268727 n) (A070939 (A003987bi n (A268717 (+ 1 n)))))  ;; A003987bi implements the bitwise-XOR, defined in A003987.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 13 2016
